long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Design Changes to Twitter, YouTube, Reddit & Twitch

** Turn off and on features through the extension icon

This is a visual update to social media to make your commenting experience better.  Each platform has an off / off Switch so you can independently control which interface upgrades you want.

YouTube: Comments are reformatted into a more compact, 2-column arrangement, and the video will move to the right and scroll with your screen as you read the comments.  You can browse comments while the video plays.

Twitter:  A search button is added to the header of user tweets.  You can quickly search twitter profiles to learn what they think about a topic and whether you want to follow them.

Twitch: Comments are reformatted for a faster reading experience, especially useful on large channels where the scroll is so fast you can't read the names.

Reddit: Directs to an alternative Reddit experience with column style format.
